description:
Aurora-hime used to live on the Earth`s moon, which was then a peaceful place. During an attack by space monsters, the moon was devastated, leaving Aurora as the only survivor.
When the energy of the galaxy begins to weaken, Aurora is chosen by Earth`s professor Kitty to travel to the Great King planet to restore it, due to her ability to channel the energy.
Her character is based on Xuanzang.
name: Aurora-hime
